pipes.name: SearchBooksPipe

interfaces.name: AppState
BestOffer
Book
CommercialOffers
MinusOffer
PercentageOffer
ShoppingCartItem
ShoppingCartState
SliceOffer

injectables.name: BooksService
ShoppingCartService

components.name: AppComponent
BookCardComponent
components.templateData:
{{ book?.title }}

{{ synopsisParagraph }}

prix: {{ book?.price | currency: 'EUR' }}

components.name: BookQuantityComponent
components.templateData: {{ quantity }}

components.name: BooksSearchComponent
components.templateData: Loading...

components.name: HeaderComponent
components.templateData: Henri Potier Store {{ itemsCount }} Panier

components.name: ShoppingCartComponent
components.templateData:
Panier

Votre panier est vide

components.name: ShoppingCartSummaryComponent
components.templateData:
{{ item.book.title }} {{ item.quantity }} x {{ item.book.price | currency: 'EUR' }}
Offre -{{ bestOffer.offer.value / 100 | percent }} Offre -{{ bestOffer.offer.value | currency: 'EUR' }} Offre -{{ bestOffer.offer.value | currency: 'EUR' }} chaque {{ $any(bestOffer.offer).sliceValue | currency: 'EUR' }} -{{bestOffer.discount | currency: 'EUR'}}
Total {{ total | currency: 'EUR' }}  {{ finalPrice | currency: 'EUR' }}

variables.name: addToCart
variables.defaultValue:
createAction(
  '[Books Search Page] Add to Cart',
  props<Book>()
)

variables.name: getShoppingCartItemQuantity
getShoppingCartItemsCount
getTotalPrice
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  getShoppingCartItems,
  (items: ShoppingCartItem[]) => items.reduce((acc, item) => acc + (item.quantity * item.book.price), 0)
)

variables.name: removeFromCart
variables.defaultValue:
createAction(
  '[Books Search Page] Remove from Cart',
  props<Book>()
)

variables.name: shoppingCartReducer
Template

src/app/books/components/book-card/book-.name: Template

src/app/books/store/books-search.actions.name: addToCart
src/app/books/store/books-search.actions.defaultValue:
createAction(
  '[Books Search Page] Add to Cart',
  props<Book>()
)

src/app/books/store/books-search.actions.name: removeFromCart
src/app/books/store/books-search.actions.defaultValue:
createAction(
  '[Books Search Page] Remove from Cart',
  props<Book>()
)

src/app/app.state.ts.name: getShoppingCartItemQuantity
getShoppingCartItemsCount
getTotalPrice
src/app/app.state.ts.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  getShoppingCartItems,
  (items: ShoppingCartItem[]) => items.reduce((acc, item) => acc + (item.quantity * item.book.price), 0)
)

src/app/shopping-cart/store/shopping-car.name: shoppingCartReducer
